tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (X (X (WP What)) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN tragedy)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (NNP Kolkata)) (: -) (SBARQ (WHADVP (WRB when)) (SQ (MD will) (NP (PRP we)) (VP (VB take) (NP (JJ human) (NN life)) (ADVP (RB seriously)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NNP India))))) (. .)))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [tragedy/NN dep>What/WP det>a/DT nmod:in>[Kolkata/NNP case>in/IN punct>-/: dep>[take/VB advmod>when/WRB aux>will/MD nsubj>we/PRP dobj>[life/NN amod>human/JJ] advmod>seriously/RB nmod:in>[India/NNP case>in/IN] punct>./.]]]
